title: Scrape every url on the web without getting blocked by Anti-Bot technologies with Scrappey
author: Bela

readme:
## Purpose of the workflow

Most scraping workflows get blocked by anti-bot technologies. To avoid this, you can use Scrappey to scrape every website you want.

## How it works:

We use Test Data and make a API Call to the Scrappey service.  
We get the scraped website data back as a result.

## Setup Steps:

  * Replace YOUR_API_KEY in the "Scrappey API Call" node with your Scrappey API Key ([Register For Free](https://scrappey.com/?ref=n8n))
  * Replace the test data with your production data. You can plug in any type of data connector at this point of your workflow.
readme_zh:
## 工作流程目的

大多数爬虫工作流会被反机器人技术拦截。使用Scrappey即可绕过限制，自由抓取任意网站数据。

## 实现原理：

1. 通过测试数据向Scrappey服务发起API调用  
2. 以结构化数据形式返回抓取结果

## 配置步骤：

  * 在"Scrappey API调用"节点中替换YOUR_API_KEY为您的专属密钥（[免费注册](https://scrappey.com/?ref=n8n)）
  * 将测试数据替换为实际数据。您可以在工作流该节点接入任意类型的数据连接器

（注：保留Scrappey品牌名不译，ref=n8n推广参数维持原样，注册链接保留英文域名）
title_zh: 使用Scrappey抓取网页上的所有链接，避免被反机器人技术拦截。
